sense.gloss: to fall (over, down), to collapse, to take a fall, to topple
to be destroyed (in a collapse), to collapse, to cave in, to crumble, to give away
to be confined to bed (with an illness), to come down with, to break down (e.g. from overwork)
to go bankrupt (of a company, bank, etc.), to fail, to collapse, to go under
to be defeated (in a game), to lose
to fall (of a government, dictator, etc.), to be overthrown

sdata.j: ブルータスがシーザーを↑刺↑↓さ↓して、シーザーが↑倒↑↓|たお↓れる|。
sdata.e: Brutus stabs Caesar, and Caesar falls.

sdata.j: だって↑私↑↓わたし↓↑達↑↓たち↓は↑結局↑↓けっきょく↓↑冷↑↓つめ↓たい↑土↑↓ど↓に↑倒↑↓|たお↓れる|のだから。
sdata.e: Because we'll all fall down on the cold ground.

sdata.j: スタディアムはたいへん↑暑↑↓あつ↓くて、↑倒↑↓|たお↓れる|かとおもった。
sdata.e: It was so hot in the stadium that I thought I was going to pass out.

sdata.j: ケリーはぶっ↑倒↑↓|たお↓れる|まで↑働↑↓はたら↓いた。
えりこは↑食事↑↓しょくじ↓もとらずに↑長↑↓なが↓い↑間↑↓ま↓、↑一生懸命↑↓いっしょうけんめい↓↑働↑↓はたら↓いたので、↑倒↑↓|たお↓れる|のではないかと↑思↑↓おも↓った。
sdata.e: Eriko worked so long and so hard, without stopping to eat, that I feared she would faint.

sdata.j: あの↑元気↑↓げんき↓な↑男↑↓おとこ↓が↑病気↑↓びょうき↓で↑倒↑↓|たお↓れる|なんて、↑鬼↑↓おに↓の霍乱ともっぱらの↑噂↑↓うわさ↓だよ。
sdata.e: For a healthy cheerful guy like that to get sick is like the devil getting sunstroke. Everyone is talking about it.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑通↑↓とお↓りで↑老人↑↓ろうじん↓があお↑向↑↓む↓けに↑倒↑↓|たお↓れる|のを↑見↑↓み↓た。
sdata.e: I saw an old man fall on his back in the street.

sdata.j: ↑内閣↑↓ないかく↓は↑倒↑↓|たお↓れる|だろうということだ。
sdata.e: They say that the cabinet will fall.

sdata.j: ↑内部↑↓ないぶ↓↑分裂↑↓ぶんれつ↓した↑家↑↓いえ↓は↑倒↑↓|たお↓れる|。
sdata.e: A house divided against itself can't stand.

sdata.j: ↑木↑↓き↓がすさまじい↑音↑↓おと↓を↑立↑↓た↓てて↑倒↑↓|たお↓れる|のが↑聞↑↓き↓こえた。
sdata.e: We heard the tree fall with a crash.
